title: Clara Barton National Historic Site: Photos & Multimedia
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia       The Photo Gallery link offers an on-line selection of 12 photographs of Clara Barton. The Virtual Tour link directs you to the Clara Barton Interactive Experience. This is a Flash production with sound that has two components to choose from. Experience a virtual tour of Clara Barton National Historic Site and also try the interactive learning activities.
